snippet: The kayak instructor, author and boat designer, completed a 100-plus-mile crossing of the North Sea from England to Belgium in a record 31 hours in 1976, a year after the same attempt ended in a spectacular failure.
abstract: Derek Hutchinson, sea kayaking pioneer, dies at age 79.
lead_paragraph: The kayak instructor, author and boat designer, completed a 100-plus-mile crossing of the North Sea from England to Belgium in a record 31 hours in 1976, a year after the same attempt ended in a spectacular failure.

headline.seo: Derek Hutchinson, Pioneer of Sea Kayaking as a Sport, Dies at 79
headline.main: Derek Hutchinson, Pioneer of Sea Kayaking as a Sport, Dies at 79
headline.print_headline:
Derek Hutchinson, 79,
A Pioneer of Sea Kayaking
